snippet.title: Fort Triumph: Kickstarter
snippet.description:
Our Kickstarter is now LIVE!

Fort Triumph is a tactical RPG taking the next step and making levels interactive like never before - making every obstacle and every bit of cover a weapon in the right hands.

Check out our project on Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/forttriumph/fort-triumph-tactical-rpg/
Or play our demo at:
Gamejolt - http://gamejolt.com/games/forttriumph/235255
IndieDB - http://www.indiedb.com/games/fort-triumph/downloads
Or on our Kickstarter page.

Twitter - https://twitter.com/FortTriumph
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/FortTriumph/
Website -  https://forttriumph.com
Email - info@forttriumph.com
